channel.title: Risk Taking on Tinu Alikor
channel.description: Recent content in Risk Taking on Tinu Alikor

item.title: Ten ways to improve confidence
item.description: 1. Believe in yourself You need to be your own cheerleader. Focus on the things you’re great at. Trust your own abilities. Remember the things you have achieved so far and use those memories as a foundation for the things you’d like to achieve in the future. Don’t be afraid to be heard. Your opinion is valuable and countsÂ 2. Silence your inner critic Self deprecation needs to stop. When someone says you look great, say thank you.
